parameters.name: Where
parameters.description: Where to insert the column as specified in swTableItemInsertPosition_e

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the column where to insert the new column

title: ITableAnnotation.InsertColumn
signature:
System.Boolean InsertColumn( 
   System.Int32
Where
,
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.String
Name
)

parameters.name: Where
parameters.description: Where to insert the column as specified in swTableItemInsertPosition_e

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the column where to insert the new column

returns: True if column is inserted successfully, false if not
remarks: The index for both rows and columns is 0-based.
